admin.summary: Contains the Data for the admin And methods to Validate the data

validate.summary: Validates input data with stored data in the Admin Class
validate.returns: true if the data is valid, false if the data is invalid

SailedItems.summary: Class to store the data of the items that are sold by the user And methods to add the items sold by the user

Increment.summary: Increments the number of items sold by the user
